{{Infobox Berry |name = #45 Payapa |image = [[File:Payapa.png]] |caption = This Berry is said to sense human emotions for the way it swells roundly when a person approaches. The same behavior affects nearby plants, causing additional mutations. |growtime = 9h 30m 0s |harvest = 30 berries |replant = 5% |mutation = 0.01% |points = 1,900 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *15 sour }}
